name: Existing macroinvertebrate or fish IBI class
functionStatement: Physical and chemical conditions enable spawning, juvenile growth, migration, and stress survival of target taxa.
descriptionMarkdown: Diverse macroinvertebrates (incl. EPT) if historically expected, unless ephemeral dryness limits.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compile the most recent macroinvertebrate or fish IBI score or class from state or local databases for the reach or nearest station.

inputs.label: Existing macroinvertebrate or fish IBI class

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: IBI class is Excellent or Good, or equivalent high condition category.

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: IBI class is Good-Fair or slightly below reference.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: IBI class is Fair or impaired.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: IBI class is Poor or severely impaired.
